original_title: Black Sabbath: The Rock and Roll Hall Of Fame Induction
overview: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame, established in 1983 and located in Cleveland, Ohio, United States, is dedicated to recording the history of some of the best-known and most influential musicians, bands, producers, and others that have in some major way influenced the music industry, particularly in the area of rock and roll.
title: Black Sabbath: The Rock and Roll Hall Of Fame Induction
